string.text: STASH
Grab the loot
I left my things in a stash not long ago. I hope they're still there.
FIRST EARNINGS
Talk to the trader
Yurok and I should stop getting hammered like that. I should go look for work - Sidorovich might have some.
NEW EXPEDITION
Find the artifact collector

It's been a damn long time since I wandered around the Cordon. I've been asked by Sidorovich to find someone who collects artifacts - according to him, he set off to the tunnel under the bridge with the Electro anomalies.
Tell Sidorovich about the collector's death
I found the artifact collector's body. Time to report to Sidorovich.
Tell Sidorovich about the collector's "death" or turn him in
The collector borrowed a decent sum from the trader and decided to fake his death by using someone's else body... I need to think about how to deal with this.
ELECTRO TUNNEL
Get the artifact from the anomaly
Based on the note from the artifact collector, there's an artifact in the tunnel. I need to check it out.
ARTIFACTS FOR THE TRADER
Check the first anomaly for artifacts
Check the second anomaly for artifacts
Check the the third anomaly for artifacts
Sidorovich promised to pay well for every artifact brought to him, and I really need the money right now. Can't wait to head into the Zone.
Return to Sidorovich
ANOMALY CASULATIES
Examine the soldiers' place of death
Yurok messaged me that the soldiers that were sent after us died in an anomaly. Maybe they have something useful on them - I should check it out.
STRANGE GLOW
Wait until nightfall
I need to wait until it gets late to confirm Mikhalych's theory about glowing objects in the night being artifacts. Better wait until 2 a.m. to be sure.
Go to the anomaly
Time to head to the anomaly and try to find the artifacts the technician told me about.
Kill the poltergeists or go back
The glow wasn't being emitted by artifacts at all - poltergeists appear in the anomaly at night. They're the ones behind the captivating light illusions...
Tell Mikhalych about the poltergeists
Time to tell Mikhalych about everything I saw in the anomaly.
OLD ACQUAINTANCES
Talk to Fanatic
The trader told me that Fanatic might need help... and I really need some dough right now.
MUTANT LAIR
Get the dynamite
Fanatic told me to get some dynamite while he and his boys make their way to the spot. I need to look somewhere near the locomotive.
Reach the destination
Fanatic sent me the coordinates of the lair. I should set off to there - he and his boys are already waiting for me.
Set the dynamite
Fanatic and his boys will cover me while I set the dynamite. I hope everything goes well.
Talk to Fanatic
It blasted like a cannon. Time for Fanatic to hand over my reward.
FIRST RIFLE
Talk to the technician
Fanatic rewarded me with his aging but fully functional AK. It'll need some maintenance to be able to fire again.
Wait until the technician finishes repairing
Mikhalych will let me know when he finishes repairing my AK. In the meantime, I could do some jobs.
Get the AK from the technician
Mikhalych messaged me that the work is done. Time to pick up my shooter.
DUTY
Collect the money from the stalker
Vovka Broken told me that the swindler's located somewhere around the mill. I should collect his debt - eight thousand.
Give the money to Vovka
A slippery type for sure, but I have the money. Just need to get back now.
WORK AT THE CORDON
Talk to Sidorovich
What is up with me these days? Drunk off my ass again... Head's about to explode! I'll go talk to Sid for work. Otherwise, I'll never get to the Garbage at this rate...
ATTACK ON THE VILLAGE
Fight off the mutants
Damn it, where did they come from?! The scientists and their damn device is to blame for all this!
Return to the technician
The attack is repelled. Time to find out the nature of this mutant attraction device...
JOB FOR A SUIT
Install the scientist device at the vehicle station
Mikhalych asked me to install the scientists' device at the bandit camp at the vehicle station, after which he promised to give me a suit.
Return to Mikhalych
Job's done. Time to get back to Mikhalych for the suit he promised.
A FRIEND IN NEED
Talk to Yurok

The trader won't have any deals with me anytime soon. I should head over to Yurok, as I don't have anyone else I can trust around here. I hope he's already slept himself sober and that he'll have some advice to share...
WORK AS A GUIDE
Go to the tunnel

Yurok was positively plastered, no surprise there. But that's alright - I'll guide some rookies for him and earn some money. And I'll need to do it early in the morning, or else things will end up like last time...
Take the rookies to the village
There's something odd about these folks... Whatever, I'll take them to their destination and get some cash, and then I'll stock up for my trip to the Garbage.
ROBBERY
Return to the village
Way to go with making a killing in the Cordon, Axe... Where the hell am I supposed to find those bastards now? Where's my stuff? I'll go see Yurok.
STOLEN GOODS
Find the thieves
Those bastards just came to the Zone and are already making a living as thieves. But I'll find them! Yurok told me I should look for them at the mill or the farm.
Take the things
Thank god my stuff is in one piece! The bastards didn't have time to sell it.
Return to Yurok
I'm finished with the thieves. I need to return the pistol to Yurok.
FEAR OF THE UNKNOWN
Go to the Garbage
Finally, I'm done with this boring Cordon - time for new surroundings! I do feel intimidated, but I'd very much like to see other parts of the Zone.
SMALL-TIME JOBS
Grab the trader's laptop
Apparently, Sid broke his laptop with those monstrous hands of his. It is currently held by the technician for repairs, and I need to pick it up.
Take the laptop to Sidorovich
I'll take the battered laptop to its owner.
PROFITABLE DEAL
Go to the technician for gas
Someone found a brand-new car right next by the road and asked me to go pick up some gas while he watches over it.
Take the canister to the stalker
Another grand in the wind... Why did I sign up for this crap? I hope the compensation will be fair.
COMPANION IN TROUBLE
Help the stalker
A stalker is being attacked by bandits and is asking for help. I shouldn't leave him behind.
DREAMS
Visit the CNPP
Man, the amount of tales I've heard about the center of the Zone is unbelievable! I just want to go there, hunt artifacts, see the Wish Granter!
WORK FOR THE TRADER
MISSING STALKER
Find traces of Kiryukha
A stalker named Puck asked me to find his missing friend whenever possible. He's likely to be somewhere beyond the bridge.
Follow the cries for help
Someone is crying for help near the mill. I should check it out.
Kill the unusual flesh
The mill is inhabited by some kind of talking flesh. It seems this is the cause of many stalkers' deaths.
Help the survivor
I need to question the survivor about what happened at the mill and try to help him to a safe spot.
Go to the village for help
I need to tell Puck about what happened and about his comrade's death, and then decide what to do next.
Talk to Puck about the task
When I'm ready, I should talk to Puck. We'll eliminate the unusual flesh.
Shoot down the pack of flesh
Time to avenge the stalkers who died at the mill. God be with us...
Hide from the emission in the tunnel
Couldn't have come at a worse time! I need to get inside the tunnel ASAP.
Hold position in the tunnel
Even despite the emission, it seems the beasts latched onto us. We cannot let them come close.
Return to the village
Well, that was something... but we made it! Time to get back and get some rest.
UNIQUE GROZA
Ask Mikhalych for a repair
This is a gun you could only ever dream of! On the other hand, it's in no fighting condition. I'll speak with Mikhalych for help.
Find materials for Mikhalych

Mikhalych agreed to help me repair the Groza free of charge, though he asked me to find him materials for the job. He told me I should head into the underground network in the hangar at the Garbage. I'll bring everything I find.
Give Mikhalych the materials
Finally, I gathered up the stuff for the technician. Time to return and see my gun.
Wait until the technician finishes repairing
Mikhalych will give me a holler when he finishes repairing the rifle. In the meantime, I could do my jobs.
Pick up the weapon
Mikhalych messaged me that the repair is done. Time to pick up the gun I've been waiting for.
OLD FRIENDS
Meet Yurok
It's been a while since I last visited the Cordon. Even started missing that place. My friend Yurok asked me to stop by in the rookie village - he's got something to discuss with me.
STRANGER THINGS
Talk to Fanatic
А worried Yurok messaged me about some problems that have surfaced. I need to find out what it's about from Fanatic.
Go to the mercenary camp
Fanatic told me about a mercenary group that took down three stalkers from the rookie village. We go to their camp at dawn to settle scores.
Attack the mercenaries
I should help my comrades attack the mercenary camp.
Talk to Fanatic
The mercenaries disappeared from the camp without a trace. I need to ask Fanatic and see what he has to say.
THINGS NEVER CHANGE
Have a drink by the fire with Yurok
I barely got on my feet last time, and I'm already being invited for a drink again. I won't turn down an old friend - don't have anything to do anyway.
SURVEILLANCE
Reach the outpost
Sidorovich asked me to follow the scientists. Their group is just about to arrive at the checkpoint.
Wait until the alarm goes silent
I've been spotted. Better not engage in combat - I should wait until everything dies down. Maybe have a snooze in the village?
Tell Sidorovich that the scientists' objective is called off
After fighting broke out, the military aborted all scientist field research. I doubt they'll show up again for some time.
Follow the scientists
I need to carefully follow the scientists and find out what they're looking for in the Cordon.
Make a decision

God dammit! I have to worm my way out of this. If I tell Sidorovich that I failed, my reputation goes to hell. What if I try disposing of the soldiers and find out what the scientists wanted that way? My heart's racing like a jackhammer...
Talk to the scientists
I screwed things up big time... The soldiers are dead. I should go talk to the scientists now that I've made such a mess.
Search the scientist bodies
Well, what's done is done. I should examine the scientists' bodies - might find something useful.
Return to Sidorovich
I managed to get the device from the scientists. I'll tell Sidorovich that no more field research will be conducted.
Return to the trader
I followed the scientists. Time to give Sidorovich the details and grab my reward.
Give Puck's information to Sidorovich
A stalker named Puck informed all stalkers that the scientists and military installed some device in the floating village by the vehicle station. I'll tell the trader about this.
TECHNICIAN ERRAND
Bring Mikhalych the scientists' device
Mikhalych asked me to bring him the scientists' device. It must be of particular interest to a technician.
Get the scientists' device by entering the teleporters
I've never entered any teleporters before. Hope I don't get torn to pieces... On the other hand, the brainiac got through them just fine. I just need to find a safe path to reach the device.
Give the scientists' device to Mikhalych
I got the thing. Now I'll take it to the technician - he promised me a reward.
Get the scientists' device in the anomalous village
I've never entered any teleporters before. Hope I don't get torn to pieces... but if the scientist made it, so can I. I just need to find a safe path to reach the device.
SWEEP
Deal with mutants near the tunnel
Sidorovich asked me to get rid of the beasts near the Electro tunnel.
Return to collect reward
The beasts are dead. Time to pick up my reward from Sidorovich.
MASTERS FROM THE CORDON
Find a stalker named Mute
Stalkers from the Cordon have lost a comrade of theirs. According to them, he went on a scouting expedition at the Army Warehousees. If I find myself there, I'll have to look for information on him.
Rescue Mute
Mute, the stalker from Brute's group, ended up behind bandit bars. I need to rescue him somehow...
Meet stalkers in the Bar
I managed to free the stalker named Mute from bandit captivity. He suggested I go to the Bar to celebrate his escape.
Return to Brute

I was able to free Brute's friend who somehow ended up in the Dark Valley. Mute told me that the boys from his group will be glad to see me and proposed we celebrate his escape. I should head over to them.
FOE TO FOES
Talk to the checkpoint commander
I should talk to the commander to advance the investigation. Any bit of information will be useful right now.
Interrogate the arrested stalkers
The detainees at the checkpoint may know something useful. I should ask them before going to Sidorovich; they may know more about the stalker we're looking for.
Change into stalker clothes

Going into the village with military equipment is a surefire way to provoke the stalkers. The commander informed me about a crate with confiscated goods from trespassers; I should find some appropriate clothing or even go without anything at all.
Talk to Sidorovich
Time to have a word with Sidorovich about a stalker named Axe - that's the name the locals know him by, if the prisoner didn't lie to me.
IN THE STALKER'S TRACKS
Go to the collapsed bridge
Sidorovich didn't tell me anything about the stalker, but he did give me his supposed exact location. I get the feeling that the old man is duping me and that there's something to this.
Look for traces at the Cordon

I was unable to reach Sidorovich in my disguise, and the locals are just keeping their lips zipped. I'll have to look for information on the stalker by myself. I should get deeper into the Cordon - perhaps someone will give me a clue.
SCIENTIST IN TROUBLE
Get to the Garbage
The colonel asked me to save a scientist who wound up into the hands of bandits with expensive equipment. Just why did he set off without any escort?
Help the assistant
I'm at the Garbage. Time to help the scientist in the soup.
Kill the bandits and save Koval

The scientist who needed rescuing turned out to be Koval. The bandits seized him along with a new detector he was carrying. The colonel's starting to get out of line with his business... but I'll have to assist him anyway.
Talk to Koval
The bandits are no longer a threat. Time to ask this "scientist" a few questions.
OLD GUARD
Talk to Kostyl
Kostyl said he had some urgent business to attend to. I have to go see him.
Meet the stalker group
Sidorovich is sending me to the Garbage to help a stalker group. I need to keep them safe while they search for artifacts.
Inspect the site of the dead stalkers
The whole group is dead. I should examine the place where they died and search the bodies for any information.
Meet with Vizier
I found the PDA of a mercenary that points to a certain Vizier. By their regulations, the PDA should be taken to their leader. Judging by the coordinates, I'm to go into the Dark Valley.
Check the fallback meeting place
Vizier sent me with one of his men to check some fallback meeting place. Not much is clear to me, but I couldn't refuse - they were acting muddy, might've whacked me on the spot.
Read the stalker's PDA in Cluster's stash

Cluster found a PDA where the stalker group died and temporarily left it in his stash to make sure nobody was following. Things have calmed down, so I can look there and try to find some useful information.
Talk to Cluster
The information from the stalker's PDA is painting a rather interesting picture. I should discuss further plans with Cluster.
Find survivors from the stalker group and find out what happened

A bandit, Cluster, saved me when I was held at gunpoint by one of Vizir's men. Now I need to get my hands on any information about the cargo the stalkers were carrying. Cluster found a PDA on one of the stalkers' bodies that indicates one of their comrades' location. I need to go there and find out more details.
Wait for Smyshlov's instructions

Some professor Smyshlov is remotely controlling the state of the mysterious device, which is apparently far from harmless. We need to wait for instructions from Smyshlov and hold our positions around this hardware.
Talk to Cluster
We held off the attack and have received further instructions from Smyshlov. I need to discuss our next course of action with Cluster and decide what to do with this Birdie stranger.
Get to the crossroads
While moving toward the Garbage, we need to decide who to give the device to: Smyshlov or Turov's people, who we haven't really had a chance to meet yet.
Decide what to do next
We're at the crossroads. Now we need to decide once and for all who gets the device: Turov or Smyshlov.
Kill the Controller and take measurements
Turov demanded measurements in the immediate vicinity of the location of the Controller, who must first be killed.
Back to Turov
God willing, we managed to kill the controller and take measurements. We should go to Turov.
To meet with Smyshlov
Get a set of psi-blockades from Sidorovich.
Smyshlov needs the psi-blokades drugs. He's made a deal with Sidorovich, I just have to get them.
Take the drugs to Smyshlov
The merchant kindly gave me a set of psi-blockades. Time to move on to Smyshlov.
Let Smyshloff know that ready
Smyshlov is waiting to start moving towards Turov. We need to finish our business as soon as possible and get going.
Going to Turov's
TRANSMUTATION
Find the artifact with Gobber
A stalker from the village, Gobber, said he saw an unusual artifact behind the railway embankment. I ought to go there with him and check if it's true.
Get the artifact
I should follow Gobber and get the artifact he was talking about.
Show Gobber the artifact
Gobber wasn't lying: we really did find a rare artifact by the farm. Time to discuss this with him.
Wait until Gobber sells the artifact
The job is done. Gobber told me he'll finish up his things, sell the artifact, then let me know when I can collect my cut.
Collect my cut
Gobber sold the artifact. Time to get my cut from him.
Help Mikhalych
Find tools for basic work
Mikhalych asked me to find him tools for basic work for him to start doing some simple equipment upgrades.
Bring Mikhalych tools for basic work
I managed to find tools for basic work. Now Mikhalych will be able to do at least some upgrades for my gear.
Find tools for fine work
Mikhalych needs tools for fine work in order to do some relatively complex weapon and armor upgrades.
Bring Mikhalych tools for rough work
I've found tools for rough work. Now Mikhalych will be able to do complex equipment upgrades.
Find calibration tools
Mikhalych needs calibration tools. If I find them, he'll be able to make almost any modifications to my equipment.
Bring Mikhalych calibration tools
I have the calibration tools. Mikhalych will no longer have any trouble with doing complex upgrades.
STRANGE SIGNAL
Respond to an SOS signal
There's a continuous SOS signal coming from the grain elevator. It might be worth checking it out.
